career_goals.short_term: Secure internship or entry-level position as a web developer
career_goals.long_term: Become a full-stack developer specializing in modern web technologies and AI integration

behavioral: Tell me about a challenging project you worked on - I developed the Paulinian Student Council E-Portfolio system using Laravel and Filament, which required learning new frameworks and implementing complex database relationships for tracking member performance

Describe a time you had to learn a new technology quickly - When building my digital twin portfolio, I learned RAG systems, vector databases, and Groq API integration in a short time to create an AI-powered chat feature

How do you handle conflicting priorities and tight deadlines? - As a student balancing academics and projects, I prioritize tasks based on urgency and impact, break large tasks into smaller manageable pieces, and maintain clear communication about progress
technical: Explain your experience with Laravel and PHP - I've built a full e-portfolio system using Laravel 12 and Filament v4, implementing CRUD operations, authentication, database relationships, and admin panels for managing student council data

What JavaScript frameworks have you worked with? - I'm proficient in Next.js and React, which I used to build my portfolio website with server-side rendering, TypeScript for type safety, and Tailwind CSS for styling

Tell me about working with databases - I've designed and implemented MySQL databases for the student council system, creating normalized table structures, relationships, and queries for tracking activities and rankings
situational: How do you debug issues in your code? - I use systematic debugging by checking error logs, using browser dev tools, adding console logs strategically, and researching error messages. I also review my code logic step-by-step to identify the source

How do you stay updated with new technologies? - I follow web development blogs, watch tutorial videos, participate in online coding communities, work on personal projects, and experiment with new frameworks in my learning projects

What would you do if you encountered a problem you couldn't solve? - I'd first research documentation and online resources, break down the problem into smaller parts, seek help from online communities or forums, and learn from the solution to avoid similar issues

preparation_questions: What excites you about our product? - Research company products and articulate genuine interest
Why do you want to work here? - Connect company mission to personal career goals
What questions do you have for us? - Prepare thoughtful questions about team, technology, and growth

weakness_mitigation.mitigation: I compensate through hands-on academic projects like the Student Council E-Portfolio system and personal projects like my AI-powered portfolio. I'm actively seeking internship opportunities to gain real-world experience

weakness_mitigation.weakness: Still building expertise in advanced concepts
weakness_mitigation.mitigation: I'm a fast learner committed to continuous improvement. I regularly work on new projects to expand my skills, recently learning RAG systems and vector databases while building my digital twin portfolio

recent_learning: RAG systems with Upstash Vector and Groq API
conferences_attended: Student tech workshops and seminars at St. Paul University Philippines

open_source: Sharing code and projects on GitHub

content_chunks.title: Student Profile
content_chunks.content: I'm Karl Francis L. Lavadia, a BS Information Technology student at St. Paul University Philippines in Cagayan Valley. I specialize in full-stack development with hands-on experience in Laravel, Filament, PHP, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like Next.js. I'm passionate about building practical solutions and recently explored AI integration by creating an AI-powered portfolio with RAG systems using Upstash Vector and Groq API.

content_chunks.title: Current Student Status
content_chunks.content: Currently pursuing Bachelor of Science in Information Technology at St. Paul University Philippines. Actively working on academic projects including the Paulinian Student Council E-Portfolio and Ranking System using Laravel 12 and Filament v4. Building practical web development skills through hands-on projects and exploring modern technologies like AI integration and RAG systems.

content_chunks.title: Technical Skills
content_chunks.content: Intermediate proficiency in PHP with Laravel 12 and Filament v4 frameworks. Experience with JavaScript, Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Comfortable with HTML, CSS, and front-end development. Working knowledge of SQL and MySQL databases. Beginner in Python. Currently exploring AI/ML technologies including RAG systems, Upstash Vector database, and Groq API for building intelligent web applications.

content_chunks.title: Collaboration and Soft Skills
content_chunks.content: Strong problem-solving abilities demonstrated through academic projects. Effective team collaboration skills developed through group projects and coursework. Good time management balancing academic responsibilities with personal learning projects. Self-motivated learner who adapts quickly to new technologies. Clear communication skills for explaining technical concepts and project requirements.

content_chunks.title: Student Council E-Portfolio Achievement
content_chunks.content: Situation: Student council needed a digital system to track member activities and performance. Task: Develop comprehensive e-portfolio and ranking system. Action: Built web application using Laravel 12 and Filament v4 with MySQL database, implementing user authentication, activity tracking, and intelligent ranking algorithms. Result: Created functional system that streamlines student council performance evaluation and member recognition.

content_chunks.title: AI-Powered Portfolio Achievement
content_chunks.content: Situation: Needed professional online presence with modern AI capabilities. Task: Build portfolio website with AI chat integration. Action: Developed Next.js application with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, integrated RAG system using Upstash Vector database and Groq API for intelligent chat responses. Result: Successfully deployed AI-powered portfolio showcasing technical projects and skills, demonstrating ability to learn and implement cutting-edge technologies.

content_chunks.title: Job Search Preferences
content_chunks.content: Currently seeking internship or entry-level web developer positions. Open to opportunities in Cagayan Valley, remote work, or hybrid arrangements. Willing to relocate for the right opportunity. Filipino citizen available to travel as needed. Interested in roles involving PHP/Laravel development, JavaScript frameworks, or AI/ML integration projects.

content_chunks.title: Education Background
content_chunks.content: Currently pursuing Bachelor of Science in Information Technology at St. Paul University Philippines in Cagayan Valley. Thesis project: Paulinian Student Council E-Portfolio and Ranking System. Relevant coursework includes Web Development, Database Management, Programming Fundamentals, Data Structures and Algorithms, Machine Learning Basics, Cloud Computing, and Python Programming. Actively pursuing web development certifications.

content_chunks.title: Career Goals and Aspirations
content_chunks.content: Short-term: Secure internship or entry-level web developer position to gain real-world experience. Long-term: Become a skilled full-stack developer specializing in modern web technologies with AI integration capabilities. Currently focused on mastering Laravel/PHP development, modern JavaScript frameworks, and exploring AI/ML integration in web applications. Interested in Web Development, AI/ML, EdTech, and Startup industries. Excited about cloud deployment and DevOps practices.

content_chunks.title: AI and Machine Learning Learning
content_chunks.content: Actively learning AI/ML technologies through hands-on projects. Built personal portfolio with RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system using Upstash Vector database and Groq API for intelligent chat functionality. Gaining understanding of vector embeddings, semantic search, and how to integrate AI capabilities into web applications. Completed Machine Learning Basics coursework and exploring practical AI applications in web development.

content_chunks.title: Student Council E-Portfolio Project
content_chunks.content: Paulinian Student Council E-Portfolio and Ranking System - A comprehensive web application for tracking student council member activities, achievements, and performance. Built with Laravel 12, Filament v4, PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include user authentication, activity tracking, achievement logging, and intelligent ranking system to recognize outstanding performance and leadership among council members.

content_chunks.title: Problem-Solving Approach
content_chunks.content: Approach coding challenges systematically by breaking down problems into smaller parts, researching documentation and online resources, experimenting with different solutions, and learning from errors. Use debugging tools effectively including browser dev tools, error logs, and code review. Stay persistent when facing difficulties and continuously seek to understand underlying concepts rather than just implementing surface solutions. Document learning and solutions for future reference.
